principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Gaming HUD aesthetics
Content is King: Data is the hero
Zoom In: Focus on the P&L and Win Rate
Negative Space: Use it to separate data clusters

usage.labels: IBM Plex Sans, uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest, font-semibold

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Sans:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500;700&family=Manrope:wght@400;600;700;800&display=swap');

strategies.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4. Primary Chart: col-span-2 row-span-2. Stats: col-span-1. Feed: col-span-1 row-span-2.
strategies.marketing: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8. Asymmetrical layouts.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(34,197,94,0.4)] transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-input/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 transition-all font-mono

charts.style: Minimalist, hide grid lines where possible, use gradients for areas.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for text. Use APCA for critical data.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Update index.css with the provided color variables and font imports immediately.
2. LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard. Do not make it a generic single-column layout.
3. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Electric & Neon' vibe. Remove default rounded-xl if it looks too soft; prefer rounded-lg or rounded-md for a technical feel.
4. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Ensure tooltips are styled dark with high contrast.
5. FORMS: Group inputs logically (e.g., 'Entry Details', 'Risk Management'). Use the 'grid-cols-2' pattern for dense forms.
6. DATA: Format all currency and percentage data using the 'JetBrains Mono' font.
7. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, rows).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or centered text everywhere.
Dark Mode Only: The app is strictly dark mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless requested.
Micro-Interactions: Add hover states to every row in the trade history table.
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 for container padding. Don't cram content against the edges.
